Practice

2015 Crypto 300A

Download the project here


Part 1:

If you examine the audio file, you will notice that the amplitude of the audio is either 1 or 0 every 1 second interval. This, along with the file name "Binary Time.mp3" leads us to notice that the apmlitude of the track alternates between 1 and 0 just like binary. When we translate the 1 second intervals into binary digits we get the message:

00110010011000110011010000110111001101000110010000110100011000100011010000110000

This is the key for the zip files.

Part 2:

The guitar plucks note values (Example C note or A note) equals the letter in te hex key.
The DTMF tone is equal to the number it represents on a phone system

Key: 2a 8d b3 e7 79 da e0 87
